creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: Duck effigy bowl; bowl shaped body with duck head with a red ground; the top backside of duck head has spout that opens to the back of the bowl; design are painted in black pigment in a flame like pattern; the eyes are painted with white pigment and black outline; the beak is black and outlined by upainted red ground;
markings: Signed on bottom A.A. Peynetsa; Copyright 96; Zuni, N.M.
title: Zuni duck
